pkgmetadata.longdescription: Production Function Estimation // Implements the methods proposed by Olley, G.S. and Pakes, A. (1996) doi:10.2307/2171831, Levinsohn, J. and Petrin, A. (2003) doi:10.1111/1467-937X.00246, Ackerberg, D.A. and Caves, K. and Frazer, G. (2015) doi:10.3982/ECTA13408 and Wooldridge, J.M. (2009) doi:10.1016/j.econlet.2009.04.026 for structural productivity estimation .
